alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:49PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Platte County through 630 PM MDT... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Westview Circle, or 13 miles southwest of Wheatland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bordeaux around 615 PM MDT. Slater around 620 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 59 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County
